default.heroDescription: Experience world-class healthcare with a patient-first approach. Advanced treatments, compassionate care, and proven results for your well-being.

services.title: General Consultation
services.description: Comprehensive health assessment and personalized care plans.

services.title: Preventive Care
services.description: Regular check-ups and screenings to maintain optimal health.

services.title: Specialized Treatment
services.description: Advanced medical treatments tailored to your specific condition.

testimonials.name: Rahul Mehta
testimonials.text: The care I received was exceptional. The doctor was very attentive and explained everything clearly.

testimonials.name: Priya Singh
testimonials.text: Great clinic with modern facilities. The staff is very helpful and the treatment was effective.

testimonials.name: Amit Patel
testimonials.text: Highly recommended! I recovered much faster than expected thanks to the personalized care.

dentist.heroDescription: Experience world-class dental care with a gentle touch. From routine checkups to complex procedures, we ensure your smile stays healthy and bright.

services.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
services.description: Smile makeovers, veneers, and teeth whitening for a perfect smile.

services.title: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Painless root canal therapy to save your natural teeth.

services.title: Dental Implants
services.description: Permanent, natural-looking solutions for missing teeth.

testimonials.name: Sneha Kapoor
testimonials.text: I was afraid of dentists, but Dr. Anjali made me feel so comfortable. My smile looks amazing now!

testimonials.name: Vikram Malhotra
testimonials.text: Best dental clinic in Mumbai. Very hygienic and professional. The staff is incredibly supportive.

testimonials.name: Rohan Das
testimonials.text: Got my implants done here. The process was smooth, painless, and the results are absolutely fantastic.

cardiologist.heroDescription: Advanced heart care powered by cutting-edge technology. We provide comprehensive cardiac solutions for a longer, healthier life.

services.title: Cardiac Screening
services.description: Comprehensive heart health evaluations and risk assessment.

services.title: Interventional Cardiology
services.description: Minimally invasive procedures for heart conditions.

services.title: Heart Failure Management
services.description: Long-term care and monitoring for heart failure patients.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.text: Dr. Sharma saved my life. His diagnosis was spot on and the treatment was excellent. Forever grateful.

testimonials.name: Sunita Verma
testimonials.text: Very knowledgeable and kind doctor. Explains everything in detail and put my mind at ease immediately.

testimonials.name: Amitabh Bachchan
testimonials.text: The post-surgery care was phenomenal. The rehabilitation plan helped me get back on my feet quickly.

dermatologist.heroDescription: Reveal your best skin with our expert dermatological treatments. Personalized care for acne, aging, and all your skin health needs.

services.title: Acne Treatment
services.description: Advanced solutions for active acne and scar reduction.

services.title: Anti-Aging
services.description: Botox, fillers, and laser treatments for youthful skin.

services.title: Clinical Dermatology
services.description: Diagnosis and treatment of skin, hair, and nail conditions.

testimonials.name: Anjali Gupta
testimonials.text: My skin has never looked better! The acne treatment plan was perfect for my skin type and cleared it up in months.

testimonials.name: Meera Reddy
testimonials.text: Excellent results with the laser treatment. It was painless and the results were visible almost immediately.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: I visited for hair loss treatment and the results are amazing. The doctor is very experienced and polite.

neurologist.heroDescription: Expert neurological care for complex conditions. We offer precise diagnosis and advanced treatment plans for your brain and nervous system health.

services.title: Stroke Management
services.description: Rapid assessment and comprehensive post-stroke rehabilitation.

services.title: Epilepsy Care
services.description: Advanced diagnosis and management of seizure disorders.

services.title: Headache Clinic
services.description: Specialized treatment for migraines and chronic headaches.

testimonials.name: Suresh Nair
testimonials.text: Dr. Rao is very patient and understanding. He helped manage my migraines effectively. I can finally live pain-free.

testimonials.name: Karthik Iyer
testimonials.text: The best neurologist in the city. Diagnosed my condition accurately after many others failed.

testimonials.name: Lakshmi Menon
testimonials.text: Very supportive staff and excellent doctor. The treatment for my father's stroke recovery was exceptional.

wellness.heroDescription: Achieve balance and vitality with our holistic wellness programs. Integrative care for your mind, body, and spirit.

services.title: Holistic Wellness
services.description: Integrative approach combining modern medicine with lifestyle changes.

services.title: Stress Management
services.description: Mindfulness, meditation, and therapy for mental well-being.

services.title: Nutritional Counseling
services.description: Personalized diet plans for weight management and vitality.

testimonials.name: Kavita Sharma
testimonials.text: I feel like a new person! The holistic approach really works. I have more energy and clarity than ever before.

testimonials.name: Arun Patel
testimonials.text: The stress management program changed my life. I learned techniques that help me everyday. Highly recommended.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonials.text: Lost 10kgs in 3 months with their nutritional plan. It wasn't just a diet, it was a complete lifestyle transformation.

orthopedic.heroDescription: Restore your mobility and live pain-free. Our orthopedic specialists provide advanced care for joints, bones, and sports injuries.

services.title: Joint Replacement
services.description: Advanced knee and hip replacement surgeries for restored mobility.

services.title: Sports Medicine
services.description: Specialized care for athletes and sports-related injuries.

services.title: Spine Surgery
services.description: Minimally invasive procedures for back and neck pain relief.

testimonials.name: Arjun Singh
testimonials.text: My knee surgery was a success. I'm back to playing tennis! The recovery was faster than I imagined.

testimonials.name: Deepak Chopra
testimonials.text: Suffered from chronic back pain for years. The treatment here finally gave me relief. Thank you doctor!

testimonials.name: Manoj Tiwari
testimonials.text: Excellent orthopedic surgeon. Fixed my shoulder injury and now I have full range of motion again.

pediatrician.heroDescription: Compassionate care for your little ones. We partner with parents to ensure the healthy growth and development of every child.

services.title: Newborn Care
services.description: Comprehensive check-ups and guidance for new parents.

services.title: Vaccinations
services.description: Safe and timely immunization schedules for your child.

services.title: Growth Monitoring
services.description: Tracking developmental milestones to ensure healthy growth.

testimonials.name: Neha Patel
testimonials.text: Dr. Kumar is great with kids. My son actually likes going to the doctor now! Very friendly atmosphere.

testimonials.name: Pooja Hegde
testimonials.text: Always available when we need him. Diagnosed my daughter's allergy when others missed it. Best pediatrician.

testimonials.name: Rahul Dravid
testimonials.text: The clinic is very kid-friendly and the staff is super supportive. We trust Dr. Kumar completely with our children.
